dmca.title: [ABUSE] Incriminating photo's
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, December 13, 2005 1:13 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: Re: [ABUSE] Incriminating photo's]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Forwarding to Legal for review.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html



- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] Incriminating photo's
Date: Tue, 13 Dec 2005 13:23:01 -0500
From: Keith Reisig <r1zen187@gmail.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
References:
<624fb1d0512130116g602db06doa91528687cf12895@mail.gmail.com>
<439EC5AC.9030507@theplanet.com>
<624fb1d0512131019y7c8b8562q86883bac5e7026e3@mail.gmail.com>

In reference to her pics. You need to look deeper into the site.

http://www.privatepornpictures.com/gallery/?page=14&order=id



On 12/13/05, Keith Reisig <r1zen187@gmail.com> wrote:
>
> I'm just making the first 'ethical' attempt to have the photo's taken 
> down. If they're not down in roughly 12 hours, the issue will be dealt 
> with in a different way.
>
> Thank you
>
> On 12/13/05, Policy Enforcement <abuse@theplanet.com> wrote:
> >
> Keith Reisig wrote:
>> There are photo's listed on a site that you're hosting. The URL is 
>> http://www.privatepornpictures.com
> 
> There is not any reference to Ashley Cassidy at the URL 
> http://www.privatepornpictures.com .
> 
>> These photo's contain nude's, a first and last name, and a phone
> number.
>> The name is Ashley Cassidy on the site. I attempted to contact the 
>> webmaster, but there is no contact information available. We need
> these
>> photo's taken down immediately due to nonstop phone calls day in and
> day
>> out. Some are threatening.
> 
> The best course of action on the threatening phone calls is to contact 
> your local law enforcement.
> --
> Policy Enforcement
> The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
> http://www.theplanet.com/legal/
> >
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.1 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFDnx0ivK/XpJs6oyURAiEdAKCWo9AcDbge4VfqUkVWQlS3RPBQUACbBltM
oOlfzS/MLVPoiiB2cxrQZlY=
=hQUn
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
